FuncDef: The display y1731 eth-test command displays ETH-test configurations on a MEP that initiates an ETH-test instance.
CLIs: display y1731 eth-test md <md-name> ma <ma-name> mep <mep-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Displays ETH-test configurations in a specified MA.
The value is a string of 1 to 43 characters, and hyphens (-) or question marks (?) are not supported.

Displays ETH-test configurations on a specified MEP.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 8191.

Displays ETH-test configurations in a specified MD.
The value is a string of 1 to 43 characters, and hyphens (-) or question marks (?) are not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display y1731 eth-test md md1 ma ma1 mep 1
The total number of Eth-Test is : 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view ETH-test configurations on a MEP that initiates an ETH-test instance, run the display y1731 eth-test command.
